reviewText: While all the women give their all there just isn't any that stand out.  3 stars for effort more than anything else.

This is an old presentation, and a carryover from the video days, but darn good. The great thing is that of the five women presented (AND three more in bonus footage), NONE of them have breast implants and all but one has pubic hair. Amazing that that's the case seeing as how this was produced sometime in the mid to late '90s when basically every nude model had gone in the other direction.

Three of the featured women--Alexa, Octavia and Goldie--are smoking hot. Each vignette is upwards of 10 minutes long which is a bit lengthy for my tastes, but that's only a slight quibble.

If you've never seen a "Sneaky Preview" title (and BTW, I don't know what the name really is supposed to mean), even though they come from the same company as Hot Body they are a good deal more explicit, with a lot of spread legs, tight close-ups and finger insertion. They also have significantly lesser production values, with everything shot on one hand-held camcorder with available light, normally in a bedroom. Some viewers are going to squeak and squawk about that, and if that kind of stuff bothers you that much, don't get this. I actually find the lower production values a minor positive because you know what you're seeing is exactly what these women look like in the flesh.

I'm very happy with this purchase.
